column2: Project Role : Application Lead Project Role Description : Lead the effort to design, build and configure applications, acting as the primary point of contact.  Must have skills : SAP ABAP Development for HANA Good to have skills : NA Minimum  5  year(s) of experience is required Educational Qualification : 15 years of full time education Summary :As an Application Lead for Packaged Application Development, you will be responsible for leading the effort to design, build, and configure applications using SAP ABAP Development for HANA. Your typical day will involve collaborating with cross-functional teams, analyzing business requirements, and delivering high-quality solutions to meet client needs.  Roles & Responsibilities: Lead the design, development, and implementation of SAP ABAP Development for HANA solutions, acting as the primary point of contact for the project. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to analyze business requirements and translate them into technical specifications. Develop and maintain technical documentation, including design documents, test plans, and user manuals. Provide technical guidance and mentorship to junior team members, ensuring high-quality deliverables. Stay updated with the latest advancements in SAP ABAP Development for HANA, integrating innovative approaches for sustained competitive advantage. Professional & Technical Skills: Must To Have Skills:Strong experience in SAP ABAP Development for HANA. Good To Have Skills:Experience with SAP Fiori, SAPUI5, and SAP HANA Cloud Platform. Solid understanding of SAP ABAP programming concepts, including Object Oriented Programming (OOP) and Advanced Business Application Programming (ABAP). Experience with SAP development tools, including Eclipse and SAP Web IDE. Experience with SAP integration technologies, including SAP Process Integration (PI) and SAP Cloud Platform Integration (CPI). Additional Information: The candidate should have a minimum of 5 years of experience in SAP ABAP Development for HANA. The ideal candidate will possess a strong educational background in computer science, information technology, or a related field, along with a proven track record of delivering impactful solutions. This position is based at our Gurugram office. Qualification 15 years of full time education

column1: Hiring Delivery Manager- MS Dynamics Navision/ Business Central
column2: Role Description As a Delivery Manager in the D365 department, you will be pivotal in overseeing the successful execution and delivery of Microsoft Dynamics 365 projects. Your responsibilities will include managing project timelines, resources, and client expectations to ensure the seamless implementation and deployment of D365 solutions. This role demands a blend of technical expertise, project management skills, and a deep understanding of Microsoft Dynamics 365. Job Title: Delivery Manager- MS Dynamics Experience: 12+ Years   Job location: Thane, WFO Key Skills    Project Planning and Execution  Project Management  Budget Oversight  Resource Management  Client Engagement  Quality Assurance  Team Leadership Technical Skills:   MS Dynamics 365 full-scale ERP Solution, Navision, Business Central, E2E Implementations, handling 3rd Party Integration, Migration, Support projects, etc  Modules : Financial Management, Sales, Purchase, Manufacturing, Project, HR and Payroll, warehouse management, etc...  Responsibilities:    As a Delivery Manager in the D365 department, you will play a vital role in overseeing the successful execution and delivery of Microsoft Dynamics 365 projects.  Responsible for managing project timelines, resources, and client expectations to ensure the seamless implementation and deployment of D365 solutions.  Monitor project progress, identifying and mitigating potential risks to ensure timely and successful delivery.  Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including developers, consultants, and analysts, to optimize resource utilization.  Act as a primary point of contact for clients, fostering positive relationships and addressing any concerns or issues promptly. Understand client business processes and objectives, translating them into actionable project plans.  Implement and enforce best practices in D365 development, ensuring high-quality deliverables.  Manage project budgets, track expenses, and ensure financial objectives are met. Provide regular financial reports to stakeholders, highlighting budgetary status and any deviations.  Lead, motivate, and mentor a team of D365 professionals, fostering a collaborative and innovative work environment.  Conduct performance reviews and identify opportunities for skill development.  Stay abreast of industry trends and advancements in Microsoft Dynamics 365. Propose and implement process improvements to enhance project delivery efficiency. Qualifications Analytical Skills, Program Management, and Consulting Excellent written and verbal communication skills Experience in team management and leading cross-functional teams Ability to collaborate and build relationships with clients and stakeholders Strong problem-solving and decision-making abilities Experience in the IT industry, preferably in software development or project management Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field.  Pranita Gaikar   Talent Acquisition Specialist Email: pgaikar@ngenioussolutions.com / careers@ngenioussolutions.com

column2: Are you ready to elevate your career as Cloud Technologies expertJoin AST as a    Senior Oracle HCM Technical Consultant    and become a driving force behind our clients financial success.      As a Senior Oracle HCM Technical Consultant at AST, youll step into a world of innovation and transformation. Youll collaborate closely with clients, leveraging your deep knowledge of Oracle Cloud Technologies to craft tailored solutions that optimize financial processes and business operations.      Picture yourself leading the charge in designing and implementing Oracle Cloud Technology solutions, ensuring seamless integration and customization. Youll be the go-to expert for troubleshooting complex technical designs, solutions challenges, all while providing top-notch training and support to clients.       Key Responsibilities:           Client Collaboration   : Collaborate closely with clients to understand their technical requirements, needs and objectives. Conduct thorough assessments to identify opportunities for process improvement.        Requirements Analysis   : Gather and analyze client requirements, translating them into comprehensive Oracle Technical solutions. Provide expert guidance to align Oracle Technical solutions with client goals.        Solution Design   : Develop robust, scalable, and tailored Oracle Technical solutions. Design end-to-end technical solutions.        Configuration and Implementation   : Lead the implementation of Oracle Cloud modules, ensuring seamless integration with existing systems. Customize Oracle Applications to meet specific client needs.        Testing and Quality Assurance   : Plan and execute comprehensive testing strategies, including unit testing, integration testing, and user acceptance testing. Ensure the solution meets all technical and performance requirements.        Training and Documentation   : Provide training to client teams on Oracle technical deliverables, best practices, and system maintenance. Create clear and user-friendly documentation for clients to reference.        Support and Maintenance   : Offer ongoing support and maintenance for Oracle Cloud implementations. Address and resolve issues, perform regular system health checks, and implement upgrades when necessary.        Change Management   : Assist clients in managing change within their organizations by helping them adapt to new processes and technologies. Ensure a smooth transition from legacy systems to Oracle Cloud Applications.        Troubleshooting   : Act as a subject matter expert in troubleshooting complex technical issues and challenges. Identify root causes and implement effective solutions promptly.        Best Practices   : Stay up-to-date with Oracle Cloud best practices, industry trends, and updates. Recommend and implement improvements to maximize efficiency and productivity.        Pre-sales and CoE contribution   : Contribute to the pre-sales effort through differentiated solution offerings and estimation exercise. Contribute meaningfully to the creation of assets that will help AST come up with differentiated solutions and offerings in the marketplace.          What We re Looking For:         Resource should have 12 to 16 years experience in Oracle Cloud EBS implementation projects with proven experience in designing solutions.      Should have lead experience in at least 2 implemenation projects. Should have good functional understanding in HCM modules.      Should have strong hands on experience in technical stack like Conversions, Reports, Personalizations, webServices, Roles Security. column2: Are you ready to elevate your career as Cloud Technologies expertJoin AST as an    Oracle HCM Technical Consultant    and become a driving force behind our clients financial success.          As an Oracle HCM Technical Consultant at AST, youll step into a world of innovation and transformation. Youll collaborate closely with clients, leveraging your deep knowledge of Oracle Cloud Technologies to craft tailored solutions that optimize financial processes and business operations.          Picture yourself leading the charge in designing and implementing Oracle Cloud Technology solutions, ensuring seamless integration and customization. Youll be the go-to expert for troubleshooting complex technical designs, solutions challenges, all while providing top-notch training and support to clients.           Key Responsibilities:               Client Collaboration   : Collaborate closely with clients to understand their technical requirements, needs and objectives. Conduct thorough assessments to identify opportunities for process improvement.            Requirements Analysis   : Gather and analyze client requirements, translating them into comprehensive Oracle Technical solutions. Provide expert guidance to align Oracle Technical solutions with client goals.            Solution Design   : Develop robust, scalable, and tailored Oracle Technical solutions. Design end-to-end technical solutions.            Configuration and Implementation   : Lead the implementation of Oracle Cloud modules, ensuring seamless integration with existing systems. Customize Oracle Applications to meet specific client needs.            Testing and Quality Assurance   : Plan and execute comprehensive testing strategies, including unit testing, integration testing, and user acceptance testing. Ensure the solution meets all technical and performance requirements.            Training and Documentation   : Provide training to client teams on Oracle technical deliverables, best practices, and system maintenance. Create clear and user-friendly documentation for clients to reference.            Support and Maintenance   : Offer ongoing support and maintenance for Oracle Cloud implementations. Address and resolve issues, perform regular system health checks, and implement upgrades when necessary.            Change Management   : Assist clients in managing change within their organizations by helping them adapt to new processes and technologies. Ensure a smooth transition from legacy systems to Oracle Cloud Applications.            Troubleshooting   : Act as a subject matter expert in troubleshooting complex technical issues and challenges. Identify root causes and implement effective solutions promptly.            Best Practices   : Stay up-to-date with Oracle Cloud best practices, industry trends, and updates. Recommend and implement improvements to maximize efficiency and productivity.            Pre-sales and CoE contribution   : Contribute to the pre-sales effort through differentiated solution offerings and estimation exercise. Contribute meaningfully to the creation of assets that will help AST come up with differentiated solutions and offerings in the marketplace.              What We re Looking For:             Resource should have 6 to 10 years experience in Oracle Cloud EBS implementation projects.          Should have fair functional understanding in HCM modules.          Should have strong hands on experience in technical stack like Conversions, Reports, Personalizations, webServices, Roles Security.          Excellent communication and interpersonal abilities, with the capacity to work effectively with clients and functional teams.          Having knowledge on Oracle PaaS offerings like OIC and VBCS and experience in leading a project is a plus.          Good to have knowledge in Finance SCM modules.

column2: Responsibilities A day in the life of an Infoscion As part of the Infosys consulting team, your primary role would be to lead the engagement effort of providing high-quality and value-adding consulting solutions to customers at different stages- from problem definition to diagnosis to solution design, development and deployment. You will review the proposals prepared by consultants, provide guidance, and analyze the solutions defined for the client business problems to identify any potential risks and issues.  You will identify change Management requirements and propose a structured approach to client for managing the change using multiple communication mechanisms.  You will also coach and create a vision for the team, provide subject matter training for your focus areas, motivate and inspire team members through effective and timely feedback and recognition for high performance.  You would be a key contributor in unit-level and organizational initiatives with an objective of providing high-quality, value-adding consulting solutions to customers adhering to the guidelines and processes of the organization. If you think you fit right in to help our clients navigate their next in their digital transformation journey, this is the place for you! Technical and Professional Requirements: Should have a minimum of 9 years of functional/ techno-functional experience in Oracle Transportation Management implementation and/or support projects and worked upon OTM Release 6.x Must have strong technical and functional knowledge of the latest Oracle Transportation Management Application modules like Order management, OTM Finance, and Shipment management Must have knowledge of preparing mapping document to interface OTM system with EDI, WMS, Order management and finance systems, and should be able to translate the functional specifications into design specification for the technical team Should have experience in end-to-end OTM life cycle/implementation  OTM architecture will also be preferred  Preferred Skills: Technology->Oracle Cloud->OTM - Transportation Management  Additional Responsibilities: Good knowledge on software configuration management systems Strong business acumen, strategy and cross-industry thought leadership Awareness of latest technologies and Industry trends Logical thinking and problem solving skills along with an ability to collaborate Two or three industry domain knowledge  Understanding of the financial processes for various types of projects and the various pricing models available Client Interfacing skills Knowledge of SDLC and agile methodologies  Project and Team management  Educational Requirements Master of Business Administration,Master Of Science,Master Of Technology,Master Of Commerce,Master Of Engineering,Bachelor Of Science,Bachelor Of Technology,Bachelor Of Commerce,Bachelor of Engineering  Service Line Enterprise Package Application Services *  Location of posting is subject to business requirements

column2: As an IBM Application Architect, you directly help clients transform their business and solve complex problems. You will define the scope and vision for projects that deliver customized solutions using your knowledge of IBM platforms. You are a technical leader, serving as a liaison among business partners, technical resources, and project stakeholders. Your Role and Responsibilities As an Architect in IBM Consulting, you'll serve as a leader in defining solutions for clients. You'll be the advocate for the client while guiding the technical team to implementation. You'll collaborate with client stakeholders and internal partners to understand the business problem and requirements, constraints of the system and concerns of the various stakeholders to systematically transform detailed solutions (architectures) for the client. Your primary responsibilities include: Design and configure solutions for S/4 HANA implementations and migrations by using an agile framework. Share technical inputs and best practices to the delivery team to conduct successful outcomes for our clients. Communicate with customers to understand their needs and customize a plan to take their implementations to the next level. Required Technical and Professional Expertise At least one certification from Azure AWS GCP IBM Cloud. SAP Security GRC certification is mandatory. At least 12 years of hands-on in both SAP Security (including S/4HANA) and SAP GRC area is mandatory.  Subject Matter Expert (SME) knowledge and experience in SAP Security and GRC technical and functional knowledge in SAP S/4HANA , SAP ECC , SAP MDG (Webdynpro based), SAP BW - BOBJ, SAP GRC (AC/PC), etc. Leadership experience in conducting multiple rounds of business workshops, gathering requirements, strategize the SAP Security GRC solution & documentation, translating those into the SAP Security GRC functional & technical design, TSD Security matrix preparation, build the solution, clear the SAP review, testing support and following all other tasks END-TO-END.  End to end experience (minimum 6 years) in handling SAP Security GRC implementation (Greenfield) engagements. Exposure in handling Brownfield Bluefield implementation would be an added advantage.  Preferred Technical and Professional Expertise Must be associated (min 5 years) with SAP solutioning RFP deals, Oral presentation, customization of effort estimation model from SAP Security/ GRC side Contribution to the SAP Security community Blogs Knowledge sharing as trainer is must to have (minimum 5 years).  Contribution in creating Tools accelerators to automate any SAP Security GRC tasks actions are expected (at least 2)

column2: In this role, you will support the continued optimization of our Oracle system and prioritization of our Oracle roadmap       This will include the improvement and automation of our Oracle platform, identify and review business challenges, define technology solutions, prioritize business requests and translate business requirements into system design and requirements     Additionally, this role will focus on related projects and Oracle backlog     You will work in conjunction with a team of HRIS System Administrators who you may provide coaching and direction to in order to achieve success in implementing the Oracle strategy              Essential Functions:                 Primary business lead and point of contact for HR systems maintenance, configuration management, access management, data quality management, mass data uploads, etc.          Hands-on configuration, administration, and management of HR systems to include the core HR/Payroll system, time and attendance, performance, recruiting, on-boarding, and learning.          Provide input and thought leadership for driving HR technology and solutions that will help embed and underpin HR initiatives and the People agenda of the wider business.          Assist in developing HR technology policies and procedures, ensuring alignment of business rules, data security privacy principles and enforce compliance in key areas.          Manage all aspects of the testing, implementation, reporting and end-user training and support for assigned HR systems.          Implements upgrades to HRIS, ensuring appropriate testing is completed, problems are resolved, and identified goals are met according to established timetables. Business user, Project Management experience with Workday, HRIS and Payroll systems.          Must be able to communicate - both verbal and written - for direct consultation with customers at all levels in the organization to define requirements, design solutions, test and implement to meet business needs.          Must be able to independently evaluate and provide recommendations and decisions; especially as it relates to areas that impact other Workday functionality.          Develop others through mentorship and peer-leadership; actively participate and encourage knowledge sharing with peers and customers.          Must be able to research and develop skills independently.

column2: Build and lead a team of IT professionals who will be designing, developing, implementing, and maintaining SAP solutions. Role is pivotal in driving the strategic roadmap and operational performance of SAP initiatives and services. Maintaining a balance between technical proficiency, team leadership and a good understanding of SAP products.           Core responsibilities will include but not limited to the following:             Collaborating with Arm businesses to create, implement and lead SAP solutions, products, and services.          Delivering SAP change initiatives.          Leading a SAP team developing and supporting SAP products and services in a 24x7 or 16x5 support model.          Transforming SAP products and services to stay lockstep with advances in technologies and changes to the business environment.          Maintaining and/or improving SAP products and services through continuous improvement.          There is a requirement for on-call.           Required Skills and Experience:         A strong combination of technical knowledge and experience leading a team in SAP technologies is needed. Hold at least a B.Tech in computer science, engineering, or a related field, with at least 8 years of overall IT experience of which a minimum of 5 years is in a leadership role recruiting, training, leading and line-managing successful technical teams. Have robust DevOps project management and delivery skills, with a verifiable history of delivering complex software projects.          Competencies           Broad SAP Module Knowledge             Comprehensive understanding of a wide range of SAP modules (such as FI, CO, SD, MM, PP, HR/HCM, and others) and their integration points.          SAP System Architecture and Landscape Design.         Deep knowledge of SAP system architecture, including understanding of SAP Basis, NetWeaver, and the technical aspects of SAP S/4HANA.              SAP Configuration & Customisation.             Solid skills in SAP system configuration and customisation, including an understanding of how to tailor SAP systems to meet specific business requirements. This involves a good grasp of both the functional and technical aspects of SAP.          SAP Project Implementation and Lifecycle Management.         Expertise in SAP project methodologies, such as ASAP (Accelerated SAP), and experience in handling the lifecycle of SAP implementations, including planning, customisation, testing, deployment, and post-go-live support.            Process           Proficiency in DevOps (CI/CD), Waterfall and Agile practices and frameworks such as PRINCE2, Scrum or Kanban, including highly accurate estimation of development tasks.          Risk Management: Identify potential project and delivery risks early, evaluate their impact, and implement strategies to mitigate them effectively.          Quality Assurance: Knowledge of software quality assurance methodologies and the ability to implement processes that ensure the SAP teams outputs meet the Arm standards.          Performance Measurement: Establishing and monitoring key performance indicators to evaluate the teams progress and productivity.         Ensure robust support levels and a frictionless user experience is always maintained.          A continuous improvement attitude with the ability to analyse current processes, identify areas for enhancement, and implement improvements to improve efficiency and effectiveness.           Leadership & People Skills           Hire, develop and line-manage a functional / technical leadership team and deliver L2 and L3 SAP projects and support services.         Ability to set a clear vision for the team, outlining goals and expectations. Conveying ideas, expectations, and feedback, both in one-on-one and group settings.         Foster professional growth of team members through regular mentoring, coaching, and feedback.         Influence team, customers, collaborators and partners, gaining their support and commitment.           Nice To Have Skills and Experience:           Relevant SAP certifications that demonstrate a broad and deep understanding of SAP systems. Certifications could include SAP Certified Technology Associate, SAP Certified Application Professional! or module-specific certifications like SAP Certified Application Associate in any of the core modules

column2: Who We Are At Kyndryl, we design, build, manage and modernize the mission-critical technology systems that the world depends on every day. So why work at Kyndryl? We are always moving forward ??always pushing ourselves to go further in our efforts to build a more equitable, inclusive world for our employees, our customers and our communities. The Role Develop and implement automation workflows using Ansible Tower to automate SAP Basis tasks such as system provisioning, configuration management, patching, and monitoring. Collaborate with SAP Basis team to identify repetitive manual tasks and automate them using Ansible playbooks and modules. Customize and extend Ansible Tower functionality to meet specific SAP automation requirements. Integrate Ansible Tower with SAP systems, databases, and other enterprise applications to orchestrate end-to-end automation processes. Provide expertise in SAP Basis administration, including system installation, upgrade, performance tuning, and troubleshooting. Develop custom scripts and tools using scripting languages (e.g., Python, Shell) to enhance automation capabilities and address complex automation requirements. Create documentation, training materials, and standard operating procedures (SOPs) for automation processes and workflows. Collaborate with IT security and compliance teams to ensure automation solutions adhere to security policies and regulatory requirements. Stay abreast of industry best practices, emerging technologies, and trends in SAP automation and infrastructure automation. Are you ready to embark on a technical adventure and become a hero to our external and internal users? As Technical Support at Kyndryl, you'll be part of an elite team that provides exceptional technical assistance, enabling our clients to achieve their desired business outcomes.  You'll be a troubleshooter extraordinaire, diagnosing and repairing complex equipment, software, and systems with ease. Nothing will be too challenging for you to solve as you respond to escalated issues, report critical design flaws, reliability and maintenance problems, and bugs. You'll be the go-to person for our customers who require assistance with highly technical or sophisticated products, as well as for customer installations and training. With your passion for technology, you'll provide world-class support that exceeds customer expectations. As Technical Support, you'll perform varying degrees of problem determination and resolution of desktop hardware and software issues using your technical expertise and available resources to ensure that our customers' issues are resolved efficiently and effectively. You'll also have the opportunity to perform installs, moves, adds, and changes (IMAC) activities, as well as data backup and restore on certain accounts for clients, ensuring that all related administrative duties are completed within Service Level Agreement objectives. You will develop a deep understanding of the local and regional infrastructure, as well as key contacts in other competencies, which will enable you to ensure that the proper team is aware of ??and taking action on the problem. If you're a technical wizard, a customer service superstar, and have an unquenchable thirst for knowledge, we want you to join our team. Your Future at Kyndryl Imagine being part of a dynamic team that values your growth and development. As Technical Support at Kyndryl, you'll receive an extensive and diverse set of technical trainings, including cloud technology, and free certifications to enhance your skills and expertise. You'll have the opportunity to pursue a career in advanced technical roles and beyond ??taking your future to the next level. With Kyndryl, the sky's the limit. Who You Are You??e good at what you do and possess the required experience to prove it. However, equally as important ??you have a growth mindset; keen to drive your own personal and professional development. You are customer-focused ??someone who prioritizes customer success in their work. And finally, you??e open and borderless ??naturally inclusive in how you work with others. Required Technical and Professional Expertise ??-5 years of experience in Automation of developing Ansible tower solution for SAP - 5+ years experience in SAP Basis. - To be working in CET (i.e, 11:30AM IST to 8:30 PM IST) ??xperience with Python and required scripting skill for automation execution ??xperience with SAP non GUI connectivity and execution of task in SAP servers. Mandatory: SAP BASIS skill and Ansible tower Preferred Technical and Professional Experience ??AP Certified ??xperience with network automation/scripting Being You Diversity is a whole lot more than what we look like or where we come from, it?? how we think and who we are. We welcome people of all cultures, backgrounds, and experiences. But we??e not doing it single-handily: Our Kyndryl Inclusion Networks are only one of many ways we create a workplace where all Kyndryls can find and provide support and advice. This dedication to welcoming everyone into our company means that Kyndryl gives you ??and everyone next to you ??the ability to bring your whole self to work, individually and collectively, and support the activation of our equitable culture. That?? the Kyndryl Way. What You Can Expect With state-of-the-art resources and Fortune 100 clients, every day is an opportunity to innovate, build new capabilities, new relationships, new processes, and new value. Kyndryl cares about your well-being and prides itself on offering benefits that give you choice, reflect the diversity of our employees and support you and your family through the moments that matter ??wherever you are in your life journey. Our employee  learning programs  give you access to the best learning in the industry to receive certifications,  including Microsoft,  Google, Amazon, Skillsoft, and many more. Through our company-wide volunteering and giving platform, you can donate, start fundraisers, volunteer, and search over 2 million non-profit organizations. At Kyndryl, we invest heavily in you, we want you to succeed so that together, we will all succeed. Get Referred!   If you know someone that works at Kyndryl, when asked ??ow Did You Hear About Us??during the application process, select ??mployee Referral??and enter your contact's Kyndryl email address.

column2: Job Description:  SAP CPI/ CI Consultant We are seeking a talented SAP CPI (Cloud Platform Integration) Consultant with expertise in SuccessFactors to join our team. As an SAP CPI Consultant, you will be responsible for designing, developing, implementing integration solutions between SuccessFactors and various external systems and migrating from dell Boomi to SAP CPI. Your technical expertise and knowledge of SAP CPI will play a critical role in ensuring seamless data exchange and process automation within SuccessFactors. Responsibilities: Integration Development: Develop, configure, and test integration scenarios using SAP CPI, ensuring adherence to best practices and standards. Implement integration solutions that facilitate data exchange and process automation between SuccessFactors and other systems such as HRIS, payroll, time management, and recruiting systems. Technical Expertise: Serve as a subject matter expert on SAP CPI and SuccessFactors integrations. Provide technical guidance and support to the development team during the implementation phase and to migrate from dell Bhoomi to SAP CPI. Stay updated with the latest SAP CPI and SuccessFactors features and capabilities, and proactively suggest improvements or enhancements to existing integration processes. Troubleshooting and Issue Resolution: Identify and resolve integration issues, working closely with the development team, functional consultants, and stakeholders. Conduct root cause analysis, implement necessary fixes, and ensure the stability and performance of integration solutions. Testing and Deployment: Develop and execute comprehensive test plans to validate the quality and functionality of integration solutions. Collaborate with the QA team to resolve any defects or issues that arise during testing. Support the deployment and post-go-live activities, including monitoring and troubleshooting integration issues. Documentation and Knowledge Sharing: Document integration designs, configurations, and technical specifications. Create and maintain integration knowledge repositories, providing guidance and support to the support team for troubleshooting and issue resolution.

column2: We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Oracle Fusion Cloud Supply Chain Technical Architect to join our team     As an Oracle Fusion Cloud Technical Architect, you will be responsible for designing, implementing, and overseeing the technical aspects of the Supply Chain Oracle Fusion Cloud applications     You will collaborate closely with stakeholders from the business, IT peers, internal and external functional consultants, and developers, to ensure the successful delivery of Oracle Fusion Cloud solutions that enable our business requirements     Your expertise will be critical in guiding the technical design, development, and integration of Oracle Fusion Cloud applications to achieve optimal performance and scalability       1.Lead the technical design and architecture of Supply Chain Oracle Fusion Cloud solutions.   2.Collaborate with business stakeholders and functional consultants to understand business requirements and translate them into technical designs.   3.Provide guidance and expertise on the configuration, customization, and extension of Supply Chain Oracle Fusion Cloud applications to meet specific user needs.   4.Oversee the development and implementation of integrations between Oracle Fusion Cloud and other systems, ensuring seamless data flow and process automation.   5.Conduct technical feasibility assessments and provide recommendations for system enhancements, upgrades, and migrations.   6.Define and enforce technical standards, best practices, and coding guidelines for Supply Chain Oracle Fusion Cloud development.   7.Collaborate with development, integration, and security teams to ensure adherence to architectural designs and standards during the development lifecycle.   8.Perform code reviews and provide technical guidance to ensure high-quality code that aligns with best practices and performance optimization.   9.Troubleshoot complex technical issues related to Oracle Fusion Cloud Supply Chain applications and provide timely resolutions.   10.Stay up to date with the latest Oracle Fusion Cloud releases, features, and industry trends to provide proactive recommendations and enhancements.       REQUIREMENTS:     1.Bachelors or Masters degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.   2.Proven experience as an Oracle Fusion Cloud Technical Architect with a Supply Chain focus and deep understanding of Oracle Cloud Applications architecture and development.   3.Must have experience with Order Mgmt, Service/RMA, Direct/Indirect Procurement, Product Mgmt, Quality, Inventory   4.Expertise in Oracle Fusion Middleware technologies, including Oracle SOA Suite, Oracle WebLogic Server, Oracle ADF, and Oracle Integration Cloud.   5.Hands-on experience in Oracle Fusion Cloud implementations, including configuration, customization, and extension using Oracle Cloud Development Framework (ADF/MAF) and Oracle Integration Cloud (OIC).   6.Plus if you have proficiency in Oracle Fusion Cloud technologies such as Oracle Financials Cloud, Oracle HCM Cloud, and Oracle Customer Experience (CX) Cloud.   7.Solid understanding of integration patterns, service-oriented architecture (SOA), and RESTful APIs.   8.Strong knowledge of Oracle database technologies, SQL, PL/SQL, and performance tuning techniques.   9.Experience with cloud-based technologies, infrastructure, and deployment models, such as Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (OCI).   10.Practical experience performing integrations between OIC and 3 party applications both inbound and outbound - File based, web service and XML based. Knowledge in XSD, WSDL, SOAP, XSLT and REST   11.Technical working knowledge of SQL, PL/SQL, Java, XML, JDeveloper, Oracle BI Publisher, APEX, Visual Builder Cloud Service, OIC, Groovy Scripting, FBDI, ADFDi, Cloud Framework native to Oracle Fusion Application   12.Technical working knowledge of platforms/databases including: OCI, Containers, ADB, ATP, DBCS, Oracle Database to build complex interfaces and stand-alone applications   13.Experience in Data Warehousing, ETL technologies and Analytics solution is a plus.   14.Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to troubleshoot and resolve complex technical issues.   15.Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively collaborate with cross-functional teams and stakeholders.     PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS:     1.Oracle certifications in Oracle Fusion Cloud technologies.   2.Experience with Oracle Fusion Cloud implementation methodologies, such as Oracle Unified Method (OUM) or Oracle Application Implementation Methodology (AIM).   3.Knowledge of Oracle Identity and Access Management (IAM) and security concepts in Oracle Fusion Cloud.   4.Familiarity with Oracle PaaS offerings, such as Oracle Integration Cloud (OIC), Oracle Analytics Cloud (OAC), and Oracle Integration Cloud Service (ICS).   5.Experience with DevOps practices and tools, such as version control systems, continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD), and automated testing frameworks.

column2: A day in the life of an Infoscion As part of the Infosys consulting team, your primary role would be to lead the engagement effort of providing high-quality and value-adding consulting solutions to customers at different stages- from problem definition to diagnosis to solution design, development and deployment. You will also coach and create a vision for the team, provide subject matter training for your focus areas, motivate and inspire team members through effective and timely feedback and recognition for high performance. column1: SAP Supply Chain & Production Process Architect
column2: To lead the design and implementation of SAP solutions for supply chain, manufacturing, and logistics operations, aligning them with business strategies              Key Responsibilities:                  Supply Chain Management (SCM) : Implement and optimize SAP SCM, focusing on procurement, inventory management, and supplier collaboration      Production Planning (PP) : Oversee the SAP PP module for manufacturing process planning, scheduling, and execution      Material Management (MM): Manage the SAP MM module for procurement and inventory management, ensuring efficient material flow      Logistics & Distribution : Utilize SAP Extended Warehouse Management (EWM) and Transportation Management (TM) for optimized warehousing and logistics      Integration with Finance and Controlling ((FICO) : Ensure effective integration of supply chain processes with financial operations in SAP FICO      Process Optimisation & Automation : Continuously improve and automate supply chain and manufacturing processes within the SAP environment      Project Leadership: Direct large-scale SAP implementation projects in supply chain and production areas, coordinating with various stakeholders                    Technical Skills & Qualifications:            Bachelors or masters degree in supply chain management, Engineering, IT, or related fields.      Deep expertise in SAP S4 SCM, PP, MM, EWM, and TM modules.      Knowledge of integration with SAP FICO and other relevant modules.      Experience in leading SAP implementation projects in manufacturing and supply chain domains.      Strong analytical, leadership, and communication skills.      At least 7 years of experience in SAP Supply Chain and Production Operations business process design & configuration, preferably in the Industrial sector for End to End processes including:      Manufacturing modules SAP PP,QM,ME,MII & PP/DS      Distribution and Logistical modules SAP MM,WM,TM      Finance FI/CO      Sourcing (integration with SAP Ariba)      Experience in SAP development/configuration, implementation, and integration projects, and have a proven track record of delivering complex and large-scale SAP solutions. Nice to have a certification in one or more of the supply chain SAP modules, such as PP, FI, or SCM.      Strong technical background and knowledge of the supply chain SAP modules and their functionalities, data structures, interfaces, and integration points. Knowledge how to design, develop, and implement the SAP solutions using the appropriate tools, methods, and standards. Ability to read the SAP programming languages such as ABAP, Java, and SQL.      Experience in integration the SAP S/4 HANA with other SAP and non-SAP systems, such as ERP, CRM, BI, and third-party applications. Design, configure, and test the integration scenarios, using the appropriate SAP tools and technologies, such as SAP PI/PO, SAP CPI, CRM, SCM,BI, IoT, SAP API Management.      Good understanding of the business processes and functions of the Industrial company and how they are supported by the supply chain and operations SAP modules. Skills to analyze the business requirements, translate them into technical specifications, and propose the optimal SAP solutions that meet the business needs and objectives. Manage the project scope, budget, timeline, and quality, and ensure the successful delivery of the SAP solutions.      Deep understanding of the SAP S/4 HANA architecture, data model, and business processes.      Proficiency in SAP development tools and languages or at least ability to read the code to support issues resolution, such as ABAP, CDS, BOPF, OData, Fiori, and SAP Cloud Platform.      Experience in designing and configuring custom supply chain and operations solutions, such as reports, interfaces, enhancements, forms, and workflows.      Knowledge of SAP best practices, standards, and guidelines for supply chain and operations development.      Knowledge of SAP security and authorization concepts, such as roles, profiles, and access control.      Experience in testing, debugging, and troubleshooting supply chain and operations issues and performance problems.      Knowledge of SAP S/4 HANA migration and conversion strategies      Experience in working with agile methodologies and DevOps tools, such as Scrum, Kanban, Git, and Jenkins.      System configuration for SAP S/4 HANA, such as customizing, transports, switches, and client copies. Manage the system landscape, such as installing, upgrading, and patching the system components.      Communicate and collaborate effectively with various stakeholders, such as business users, functional consultants, project managers, and other developers.      Solve complex and challenging problems, as well as propose and implement innovative solutions that meet the business requirements and expectations. Learn and adapt to new technologies and trends in the SAP S4/HANA domain

column1: Technical Lead SAP Basis Application and Administration
column2: Personal Growth - Let us help you unlock your full potential                 Pioneering - Join us to challenge the impossible             Creativity - Discover possibilities beyond steel             Purpose - Drive progress for our planet and people             Diversity - Together, we create change                     Purpose of the job                             As      Technical Lead SAP Basis Application and Administration      , you lead and guide SAP implementations keeping the business needs and operations stability in mind for our global user communities.                                              Role description                       As      Technical Lead SAP Basis Application and Administration      , you help different teams and tracks in leading IT and Digital implementations for the SAP Basis domain and be a crucial member of the delivery teams.?                   ?                         ESSENTIAL SKILLS & COMPETENCIES                             In depth technical knowledge and hands-on of SAP Basis and NetWeaver technology stack and move to S/4HANA on SAP RISE.                      You demonstrate excellent technical skills in the context of SAP ERP platform and Best Practices:                          Ability to work across multiple tools, frameworks, databases (SAP Hana/MS SQL/Sybase) and technology stacks.                      Exposure to the public cloud (MS Azure) - preferably experience using cloud-based constructs. Experience in migration to cloud infrastructure or S/4 Hana RISE.                          6+ years of experience in SAP HANA administration along with troubleshooting                      Measurement of HANA database performance and tuning and involve in the implementation, administration and support of SAP Basis and HANA                      Should have experience application administration (RFC Setup/Monitoring, IDoc Setup/Monitoring)                      Should have knowledge on SAP Archiving, Data Volume Managment                      Should have strong skills in system performance monitoring including Application monitoring, database monitoring                      Should have knowledge on SAP TDMS technology                      Well versed with cloud-related integrations with SAP BTP (Business Technology Platform) and related cloud products                      Good knowledge and experience in integrating SAP ERP to other systems and good knowledge of interface technologies.                      Have experience of integration with SAP Cloud solutions and mobile devices as a plus; the same goes for the implementation and monitoring of security in distributed SAP landscapes.                      Have proven knowledge and experience of the SAP Basis domain, including NetWeaver (ABAP/Java, Business Technology Platform, S/4HANA), database administration (HANA, ASE, MS-SQL) and operating systems (Linux, Windows).                      Have good understanding of SAP Fiori setup in HUB and Embedded deployments.                      Solid understanding of agile methodologies and capability of supporting agile teams by providing advice and guidance on opportunities, impact, and risks, taking account of technical and architectural debt                      Articulate complex technical issues, share ideas, participate in peer-reviews/design review boards, and exhibit strong listening skills.                          Be able to collaborate with various cross functional teams, internal/external technical experts, Architects, other Technical Leads, Systems Analysts, and 3rd parties to drive technical solutions.                      Bachelors degree in computer science, information-technology, system analysis or a related study, or equivalent experience                      8+ years of experience in SAP Basis domain with design, development and integration of applications, services, data, and processes.                      3+ years of experience in a technical lead role with a strong focus on SAP Basis administration.                      Good written and verbal communication skills (in English).                                              As a Technical Lead, you:                             Guide and orchestrate the daily operational activities of the SAP ERP platform, including performance, reliability, availability, maintenance windows, upgrades, archiving and early watch monitoring.                      Maintain an active engagement on the SAP support channel, following up on partners and on SAP.                      Play an active role in the SAP audit and license count.                      Work in collaboration with Solution Architects to define architecture design and review low level design and effort estimates.                      You are the main point of contact for the technical team                      Lead geographically distributed teams, monitor risks/mitigation strategies with stakeholders and strive for improving efficiency of the solutions                      Ensure technical documentation is created and kept up to date with the as-built situation                      Lead the analysis of the current environment to detect critical deficiencies, legacy, and technical debt, and implement solutions for improvement.                      Lead diagnosis and troubleshooting efforts with team for critical and repetitive issues occurring in the systems.                      Keep IT & Digital solutions up to date with industry trends and developments, assuring backward compatibility, maintainability of applications on latest versions.

column2: We are seeking a highly skilled Senior NetSuite Functional Consultant with specialized expertise in Fixed Asset Management and Advanced Revenue Management modules     As a key member of our implementation team, you will be responsible for providing expert guidance, configuration, and support in the deployment of NetSuite ERP solutions tailored to meet our clients' business needs       Primary Skills       Solution Consulting,      Agile Transformation Consulting / Assessment / Roadmap & Backlog,      Business Consulting,      Account Level Financials and Operations,      Advanced Excel,      Business Acumen (Consume new domains quickly to learn through data)          Key Responsibilities    :        NetSuite Implementation: Lead and participate in the end-to-end implementation of NetSuite ERP solutions, focusing on Fixed Asset Management and Advanced Revenue Management modules. should have implemented 5-8 implementations of NS in IT Services and IT solutions space.      Requirements Gathering: Collaborate with clients to understand their business requirements, workflows, and processes related to fixed assets and revenue recognition.      Solution Design: Translate client requirements into comprehensive NetSuite configurations, customizations, and workflows, ensuring alignment with best practices and industry standards.      Configuration and Customization: Configure NetSuite modules, including Fixed Asset Management and Advanced Revenue Management, to meet client-specific needs. Develop custom scripts, workflows, and integrations as necessary.      Testing and Quality Assurance: Conduct thorough testing of configured solutions to ensure accuracy, reliability, and compliance with business requirements and regulatory standards.      Training and Support: Provide training and support to end-users, administrators, and stakeholders on NetSuite functionality, usage, and best practices related to fixed asset management and revenue recognition.      Documentation: Create and maintain comprehensive documentation, including functional specifications, configuration guides, and training materials.      Post-Implementation Support: Provide ongoing support and troubleshooting assistance to clients post-implementation, addressing issues, optimizing processes, and recommending enhancements as needed.      Continuous Learning: Stay abreast of NetSuite updates, new features, and industry trends related to fixed asset management and revenue recognition and share knowledge within the team and with clients.                Candidates Must Have:          Bachelors degree in business, Accounting, Finance, Information Systems, or related field.      Minimum of 5 years of experience implementing and supporting NetSuite ERP solutions, with a focus on Fixed Asset Management and Advanced Revenue Management modules.      Strong understanding of accounting principles, fixed asset lifecycle management, and revenue recognition standards (e.g., ASC 606 / IFRS 15).      Proficiency in configuring NetSuite modules, including Fixed Assets, Advanced Revenue Recognition, and Financials.      Experience with SuiteScript, SuiteFlow, and SuiteBuilder for customization and automation.      Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively engage with clients, stakeholders, and team members.      Strong problem-solving and analytical skills, with a keen attention to detail.      NetSuite certifications (e.g., NetSuite SuiteFoundation, NetSuite ERP Consultant) preferred.      Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced, dynamic environment, managing multiple priorities and deadlines effectively.            ?       Candidates should demonstrate the below listed critical leadership qualities:          Customer Advocacy - Ensures customer success on stated and unstated business priorities through strategic advice and market leading solutions.      Owners Mindset - Is passionate about Brillios business, deeply committed to its success and makes decisions that are in the best interest of the firm.      Innovation Ethos - Embraces ambiguity and adopts relentless experimentation to challenge current practices and enable continuous growth.      Execution with Pace - Displays agility to deliver high quality results in the face of changing stakeholder expectations.      Big Picture Thinking - Creates a common definition of shared success and sets bold targets that inspire the team towards new horizons.        Winning Through Teams - Enables a culture of collaboration and empowers teams to "raise their game in order to create a winning formula.

column2: Responsibilities A day in the life of an Infoscion As part of the Infosys consulting team, your primary role would be to get to the heart of customer issues, diagnose problem areas, design innovative solutions and facilitate deployment resulting in client delight. If you think you fit right in to help our clients navigate their next in their digital transformation journey, this is the place for you! Technical and Professional Requirements: We are looking for candidates having at least 5 years of experience in implementing marketing automation platforms like Responsys/ Eloqua/ Salesforce marketing cloud Experience in customer journey orchestration across email, SMS, mobile push using Responsys programs Understanding of Responsys data model Understanding Responsys campaign configuration, connect jobs, API, and data integration Experience in implementing Infinity IQ Measure and analyze the performance of digital initiatives with infinity dashboards and reports Deliver against the website optimization and customized experience strategies across website and other touch points preferably using Infinity IQ Knowledge of and experience in front-end web development technologies, namely JavaScript, CSS, and HTML A/B testing and site personalization preferably using Infinity IQ (Maximyser) Experience of building cross product integration within Oracle marketing cloud (Responsys, Infinity IQ, Unity)  Preferred Skills: Technology->Oracle Cloud->Marketing Cloud  Additional Responsibilities: Ability to develop value-creating strategies and models that enable clients to innovate, drive growth and increase their business profitability  Good knowledge on software configuration management systems Awareness of latest technologies and Industry trends  Logical thinking and problem solving skills along with an ability to collaborate Understanding of the financial processes for various types of projects and the various pricing models available Ability to assess the current processes, identify improvement areas and suggest the technology solutions  One or two industry domain knowledge  Client Interfacing skills Project and Team management  Educational Requirements Master Of Comp. Experience with SAP MDG Tool integration with other SAP modules and third-party systems. Solid grasp of SAP MDG Tool-based data migration and data quality management. Additional Information: The candidate should have a minimum of 7.5 years of experience in SAP Master Data Governance MDG Tool-based application development. The ideal candidate will possess a strong educational background in computer science, information technology, or a related field, along with a proven track record of delivering impactful SAP MDG Tool-based solutions. This position is based at our Mumbai office. Qualification Minimum 15 years of full time education

column1: Associate Principal Engineer - SAP Success Factor
column2: We're Nagarro,  we are a Digital Product Engineering company that is scaling in a big way! We build products, services, and experiences that inspire, excite, and delight. We work at scale across all devices and digital mediums, and our people exist everywhere in the world (18000+ experts across 36 countries, to be exact). Our work culture is dynamic and non-hierarchical. We are looking for great new colleagues. That is where you come in!  REQUIREMENTS:   10+ years of experience with SAP support/service delivery HR skills with SAP Payroll, SAP HCM, SuccessFactors Employee Central, ABAP-HR Experience with service management/support tools Experience within at least one more SAP module: MM, SD, FI, PM, PP, PS, QM, EHS, SOP, WM. Experience with Query Manager Experience with one or more cloud products Ariba, Concur, and Solution Manager is an advantage Knowledge about ITIL practices (incident, service, problem, and release management) Experience with interfaces (CPI, PI/PO) Microsoft Excel and PowerPoint Managing Service Level Agreements, Project Planning, Delivery Operations, Designing Solutions, and Implementing & Managing complex enterprise systems, applications, and services.  Delivery of SLA-based services for operations management, ensuring adherence to policies and processes relating to application support and maintenance. Manage the open incidents and requests and ensure detailed updates, follow-up, resolution, and closure RESPONSIBILITIES:   Writing and      reviewing great quality code Understanding      functional requirements thoroughly and analysing the clients needs in the      context of the project Envisioning      the overall solution for defined functional and non-functional      requirements, and being able to define technologies, patterns, and      frameworks to realize it. column2: The Application Consultant for the SAP MM-Purchasing acts as E2E responsible for the Purchasing topics to provide state of the art solutions and services       This includes the implementation of appropriate systems enhancements following established processes to meet customer requirements     The Application Consultant will interact with our Business facing organization to plan, prepare, execute and monitor projects as well as individual Change Requests     This will be done by leveraging technical skills provided by external partners     In this role we require an excellent knowledge of SAP MM-PUR and the adjacent modules combined with a good understanding of associated P2P (Procure to Pay) business processes integrated with ERP systems     Thus he/she should be in the position to consult business partners to find suitable and sustainable solutions meeting customer demands     Service Performance Monitoring of the Application Managed Services provided by our strategic partners belongs to the role to meet the agreed KPIs     This includes periodic reviews and the use of defined processes to hand over new services     Purchasing is connected to all relevant ERP systems to centrally create, change, and distribute, or to consolidate master data across the complete enterprise system landscape     The integration of all those components and the participation in architecture design decisions is also part of this position     Responsibilities Ensure customer satisfaction through proper solution design delivery, applications life cycle management and service performance monitoring while maintaining necessary internal (process, security) and external (GxP, GDPR, license) compliance     Secure minimal business disruption on application go live based on proper design and formal project hand-over process     Operational Vendor Management ReportingManage vendor service performance against below processes     Establish the required improvements plan as per identified gaps and/or defined requirements     Secure timely issuance of periodic performance report and annual service reviewsIncident ManagementLead the resolution of critical or complex incidents including related crisis management when appropriate     Coordinate communication and coordination with the relevant stakeholders (Infrastructure, GIAM team, business key users, etc)Problem ManagementLead master plan and priorities toward ticket elimination and automationProactively suggest possible solutions and propose an action plan for improvement to management     Change and Release ManagementEstablish documentation of current and target application architecture (incl     CMDB)Establish and implement the Life Cycle Management plan for applications in scope     Secure Change Management processes in line with relevant SOPsEnsure complete and accurate handover documents created prior to production release     Manage the application portfolio at the most appropriate level of release     Project DeliveryLead technical design of applications/solutions in portfolio     Provide technical services and functional advice on the implementation of business applications     Provide functional/technical support to project teams     Provide the technical input for defining and maintaining the development standard and guidelines     Job RequirementsBachelor/Master degree or equivalent in Computer Sciences and/or Business Administration9-year experience in SAP MM applications services i     e Implementations / upgrade / Support etc3-year experience within an international environmentEnglish mandatory (written and spoken)An additional language (German, Spanish or Portuguese) is an asset

Must have skills : SAP ABAP Development for HANA Good to have skills : NA Minimum  7.5  year(s) of experience is required Educational Qualification : 15 years full time education Summary :As an Application Lead for Packaged Application Development, you will be responsible for leading the effort to design, build, and configure applications, acting as the primary point of contact. Your typical day will involve utilizing your expertise in SAP ABAP Development for HANA to deliver high-quality solutions and collaborating with cross-functional teams to ensure successful project delivery.  Roles & Responsibilities: Lead the design, development, and implementation of SAP ABAP Development for HANA solutions, ensuring adherence to best practices and standards. Act as the primary point of contact for the project, collaborating with cross-functional teams to ensure successful project delivery. Provide technical guidance and mentorship to team members, ensuring the development of high-quality solutions. Conduct code reviews and ensure adherence to coding standards, ensuring the delivery of high-quality code. Collaborate with stakeholders to understand business requirements and translate them into technical solutions. Professional & Technical Skills: Must To Have Skills:Expertise in SAP ABAP Development for HANA. Good To Have Skills:Experience with SAP Fiori, SAPUI5, and SAP HANA. Strong understanding of SAP ABAP programming concepts and techniques. Experience with SAP development tools such as Eclipse and ABAP Development Tools. Experience with SAP integration technologies such as SAP PI/PO and SAP Cloud Platform Integration. Solid grasp of software development lifecycle methodologies and best practices. Additional Information: The candidate should have a minimum of 7.5 years of experience in SAP ABAP Development for HANA. The ideal candidate will possess a strong educational background in computer science or a related field, along with a proven track record of delivering impactful solutions. This position is based at our Hyderabad office. Qualification 15 years full time education

Responsible for designing and development of SAP RICEF objects.                          Understand and communicate how SAP ECC and S4 interacts, supports, and integrates with other technologies and information systems.                          Collaborate with other functional leads and architects across the organization.                          Manage and maintain SAP ABAP applications effectively.                          Lead and supervise teams involved in SAP ABAP application management and maintenance.                                 Responsible for the technical integrity, and technical documentation.                          Work with cross-functional teams to drive business transformational change with partners, business units, and solution teams leveraging in developing specific solutions.                          Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless integration of SAP applications.                          Develop and implement strategies for optimizing SAP ABAP applications.                                 Effectively communicate with stakeholders at all levels to gather requirements and provide updates on project progress.                          Mentor and coach team members to enhance their skills and capabilities in SAP ABAP application management and integration.                          Ensure compliance with company policies, procedures, and standards related to SAP ABAP application management and integration.                          Provide technical guidance and support during S4 migration and integration processes.                          Stay updated with the latest SAP technologies and best practices.                          Troubleshooting & Support.             Must Have: Minimum Requirements                           14+ years of experience with a bachelor s degree or 8+ years of experience with an advanced degree.                             Total 6+ years SAP ABAP technical programming experience and managing teams.                             Experience in SAP ECC and SAP S4 HANA development         - SAPUI5, Fiori Elements, OData Service, CDS Views, Embedded Analytics, etc.                             Analyse and troubleshoot complex issues related to SAP ECC and S4 ABAP applications.                          Experience working across US and multiple time zones.                          Strong verbal and written communication skills.                 Nice to Have                           Previous Medical devices and/or Pharma experience                             High-level experience with SAP system administration, configuration, sizing, and performance tuning.                              Demonstrate expertise in preparing for S4 migration within the SAP ecosystem.                          Possess a deep understanding of SAP integration methodologies and principles.                          SAP Certifications in ABAP and related technologies.

column2: The candidate should be a seasoned SAP professional with a proven track record in navigating both ECC and S/4HANA landscapes. Their expertise should extend to platform capabilities, architecture, project leadership, security, and compliance, ensuring the effective and optimal utilization of SAP systems to drive business success.       A Day in the Life                         Review and refine migration strategy and plan, ensuring alignment with business objectives and technical requirements.                             Provide guidance and direction to team members on technical aspects of the migration process, including system architecture, data migration, and testing.                             Conduct regular meetings with stakeholders to update on project progress, address concerns, and manage expectations.                             Lead and mentor team members, fostering collaboration, knowledge sharing, and professional development.                             Perform hands-on technical work, such as system configuration, data mapping, and troubleshooting, as needed to support the migration effort.                             Collaborate with other teams, such as BASIS administrators, developers, and business analysts, to ensure seamless integration and alignment of efforts.                             Monitor migration activities, identify risks and issues, and implement mitigation strategies to keep the project on track.                             Conduct regular reviews and assessments of migration progress, identifying opportunities for optimization and improvement.                             Communicate with senior management and key stakeholders to provide updates on migration status, highlight achievements, and address concerns.                             Utilize Winshuttle for data migration tasks, including data extraction, transformation, and loading.                             Provide expertise in Winshuttle functionalities, training team members as needed to leverage its capabilities effectively.                         Troubleshooting and Support.             Must Have: Minimum Requirements                     14+ years of experience with a bachelor s degree or 6+ years of experience with an advanced degree.                             Experience with SAP Material, Customer, and Vendor Master Data conversions                          Strong understanding of Data Migration Methodology (ETL) including profiling, cleansing, and validation activities                          Handson experience with LSMW and Data Migration Cockpit                          Experience with using various data migration tools and solutions that apply to SAP data migration implementations (Syniti, BODS, MDG, etc.)                          S4 HANA implementation experience                          Experience working across US and multiple time zones.                             Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written, with the ability to effectively convey complex technical concepts to diverse audiences.           Nice to Have                         Previous medical device and/or work experience in a FDA regulated industry.                          Experience with SAP system administration, configuration, sizing, and performance tuning.                          Knowledge of ABAP Development Programming Skills                          Knowledge of MDM solutions to create and maintain master data                          Knowledge on SAP S/4 and other SAP models that would require converted data in a transformation program                          Working knowledge of Signavio is desired.                          SAP Certifications

column1: SAP Senior Business Warehouse Offshore_Nearshore Senior Engineer
column2: Job Purpose: As an integral member of the SAP BW team the SAP senior BW resource will provide development and operational support to SAP BW systems and participate in 24*7 production support with very minimal supervision. In addition the SAP Senior BW Team member is responsible for providing architectural design and support for various solutions within or interface with BW.As a senior member of the team it is expected to provide guidance and mentorship to the intermediate resources Job Responsibilities: Work closely with businesses to understand their requirements and translate them into technical design specifications (TDS). Design, implementation, and maintenance of SAP BW solutions, including data modeling, ETL processes, reporting, and analytics. Provide technical leadership and mentorship to intermediate resources. Lead the team in the development and maintenance of BEx queries and AO reports. This includes complex calculations, structures, formulas, customer exits, and BADi variables. Continuous monitoring and optimize SAP BW BEx and AO performance. Provide second-level production support to the SNOW tickets and issue resolution for existing BEx and AO reports, including training for users. Develop, maintain, and implement BW best practices, processes, and standards. Possess expertise in ABAP and HANA SQLScript to create and debug routines and transformations. Lead Proof of Concept on new features and technologies and guide the team on the implementation of the POC is approved. Review monthly Early Watch Report and propose any action items identified in the report Attend DVM bi-weekly meetings on BW data management planned activities. Stay abreast of SAP development, roadmap, and hot notes to help improve the current system and advise the future state of BW. Monitor data load and interface jobs and address any issues promptly to ensure data accuracy after resolution. Address assigned SNOW tickets promptly and communicate clearly with users to provide status on tickets and resolution. Follow the established change management process to create, test, and promote changes to production, and to sync in a dual dev landscape. Perform data reconciliation on key dataflow to ensure the data quality. When an issue is reported, identify the cause, and formulate a solution to resolve the issue. Assist with functional validation after the system restore. Follow the existing test scripts and update them continuously to improve processes and efficiency. Participate in on-call rotation. Assist with any ad-hoc data requests such as from internal/external audit or 3rd party vendors. Close collaboration with other teams that support or interface with BW: Basis, Batch, DBA, SAP functional area support (FI, CO, MM, SD, etc.), Unix, Informatica, Sylvester, Marvin, Cosmos, PLM, and many others. Continuously evaluate and improve the performance of BW solutions and their usability for business users. Review and update support documentation leading to best practices, standardization, smooth onboarding knowledge transfer, and service desk support. Conduct system review regularly to identify candidates for housekeeping. Desired Qualifications & Experiences: 10 years of BW development and support experience including ETL and BEx and AO, with 4+ years of BW on HANA and 4+ years with BW/4HANA in a production environment. Experience leading a team of intermediate BW developers to provide successful project delivery and operation environment. Strong expertise in BEx query development, including key figures, characteristics, hierarchies, and variables. Deep knowledge of ABAP and HANA SQLScript to create and maintain routines and table functions used for ETL or exit and BADi variables. Experience with operation and support of BW DTO or archiving (IQ NLS), and HANA NSE for data volume management. Knowledge of SAP source systems connected to BW such as S/4, ECC, CRM, BRIM, PLM, SRM. Experience in support of tools used in BW/4 such as SLT and IQ. Adequate interpersonal and communications skills both written and verbal to include translating complex technical issues clearly and precisely to both technical and non-technical parties Strong analytical and technical communication skills. Ability to work both independently and in a team environment. Experience in mentoring intermediate resources and knowledge sharing with team. Must be able to communicate effectively and tactfully with all levels of personnel, both in person and on the telephone. Must be able to pay close attention to complex detail and understand written and oral instructions. Must be able to organize and schedule work effectively. Must be able to work well under time constraints. Must be able to handle multiple tasks with changing priorities, communicating changes in scope and schedule to all parties concerned. Must be service-oriented. Must be able to work independently. Must be able to work flexible hours, including possible overtime, when necessary. Must be able to maintain confidentiality. Preferred Experience/ Qualifications: SAC development and operational experience and knowledge. SAP certification. Knowledge of the Entertainment Industry and business applications is an added advantage Experience in supporting integration planning (IP) and BCS on BW on HANA a plus. Experience supporting the data extraction from S/4 Central Finance and Group Reporting would be beneficial. Knowledge of Entertainment Industry and business applications is an added advantage Experience with AWS
